about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: With over 20 years of experience, we serve as one of Turkey's leading dental health organizations.

mission.title: Mission
mission.text: We work to provide our patients with the highest quality dental health services and restore their smiles with modern technology and expert staff.

vision.title: Vision
vision.text: To be Turkey's most reliable and preferred dental health organization, continuing to be a leader in the sector with international service quality standards.

cta.title: We Are Here for Healthy Smiles
cta.subtitle: We are happy to serve you with our expert staff and modern technology.

history.title: History
history.text1: Founded in 2007, Hospitadent serves as one of Turkey's leading dental health organizations.
history.text2: Since our establishment, we have served thousands of patients with modern technology and expert staff.
history.text3: With our patient-focused approach and quality service understanding, we maintain a leading position in the sector.

technology.title: Technology
technology.text1: We follow the latest technological developments and offer our patients the best treatment options.
technology.text2: We use modern methods such as 3D digital scanning, CAD/CAM technology and laser treatments.

team.title: Team
team.text1: Our experienced and expert dentists continuously receive training and apply the most current treatment methods.
team.text2: With our patient-focused approach and reliable service understanding, we continue to provide you with the best dental health service.

facilities.title: Facilities
facilities.text1: In our modern and hygienic clinics, we provide our patients with the most comfortable treatment environment.
facilities.text2: We serve with sterilization standard equipment and safe treatment protocols.

quality.title: Quality Policy
quality.text1: Providing service in accordance with international quality standards is our fundamental principle.
quality.text2: With our continuous improvement and patient satisfaction focused approach, we provide the highest quality dental health service.

future.title: Future Vision
future.text1: We will continue to offer our patients the most current treatment methods by closely following technological developments.
future.text2: We are moving forward on the path of continuous development and innovation with our goal of becoming Turkey's and the world's leading dental health organization.

appointment.name: Full Name
appointment.appointmentInfo: Your appointment request will be received and you will be called as soon as possible.
appointment.success: Your appointment request has been successfully received!

blog.title: Blog
blog.subtitle: Current information about dental health and treatment methods
blog.pageDescription: Dental health, treatment methods and current dentistry information. Tips and advice from our expert dentists.
blog.pageKeywords: dental health blog, dental treatment information, dentistry articles, oral health, dental care

post1.title: Importance of Daily Dental Care
post1.excerpt: Learn how your daily care routine should be for healthy teeth.
post1.content: Daily dental care is the foundation of oral health. You can prevent dental problems with proper brushing techniques, flossing, and regular checkups.
post1.author: Dr. Ahmet Yılmaz

post2.title: Orthodontic Treatment Process
post2.excerpt: What happens during orthodontic treatment and what path is followed?
post2.content: Orthodontic treatment is a long-term process applied to properly align teeth. Patient compliance is very important in this process.
post2.author: Dr. Ayşe Demir

post3.title: What You Need to Know About Implant Treatment
post3.excerpt: How is implant treatment performed and who can it be applied to?
post3.content: Implant treatment is a modern treatment method that offers permanent solutions to replace missing teeth. Detailed information about the surgical process and aftermath.
post3.author: Dr. Mehmet Kaya

post4.title: Smile Design and Cosmetic Dentistry
post4.excerpt: Cosmetic dentistry solutions for perfect smile.
post4.content: Smile design is a comprehensive treatment plan that improves the aesthetic appearance of teeth according to the person's facial structure.
post4.author: Dr. Fatma Özkan

post5.title: Dental Health in Children
post5.excerpt: What parents need to know for their children's dental health.
post5.content: Dental health in children is ensured through regular care and checkups from an early age. The role of parents is very important.
post5.author: Dr. Ali Çelik

post6.title: Digital Dentistry Technologies
post6.excerpt: Digital technologies used in modern dentistry.
post6.content: Digital dentistry offers innovative technologies that speed up treatment processes and increase patient comfort.
post6.author: Dr. Zeynep Arslan
